about_the_game:
Quiztal Games introduces Quiz Quest: a mind-stretching, collaborative quizcapade!

Team up with friends and family, using your smartphones as your controllers, and put your heads together as you journey to achieve the rank of Master Quizards.

In this demo you are thrown directly into the action as you find yourselves face-to-face with notorious highwayman Robin Yewblind. Choose your group stats, grab a weapon each and try your best to avoid Robin's knock-out arrows whilst answering her questions!

(IMPORTANT NOTICE: Do not refresh your devices during gameplay. You cannot re-join the game if you are disconnected from the server.)
